name: UCKeyStateTerminators
desc: Lists the default terminators for each dead-key state handled by a 'uchr' resource.

items.name: var keyStateTerminatorCount: UInt16
items.desc: An unsigned 16-bit integer specifying the number of default dead-key state terminators contained in the keyStateTerminators[] array.

items.name: var keyStateTerminators: (UCKeyCharSeq)
items.desc: An array of default dead-key state terminators, described as values of type UCKeyCharSeq; the value keyStateTerminators[0] is the terminator for state 1, and so on.

items.name: var keyStateTerminatorsFormat: UInt16
items.desc: An unsigned 16-bit integer identifying the format of the UCKeyStateTerminators structure. Set to kUCKeyStateTerminatorsFormat.
